official_title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from the mandatory petroleum price regulations (DOE energy action numbered 4).

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed exemption of aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from mandatory petroleum price regulations.
